uk.org.taverna.server.client
Class PortFactory

java.lang.Object
  uk.org.taverna.server.client.PortFactory

public final class PortFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to create input and output ports and various parts of the output port data structures. Note: For internal use only. Methods in this class are not intended for use outside of this library.

Author:
Robert Haines

Method Summary

Method Detail

newInputPort

public static InputPort newInputPort(Run run,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     int depth)
Create a new InputPort. Note: For internal use only.

Parameters:
run - the run that the port belongs to.
name - the port name.
depth - the depth of the data in the port.
Returns:
a new InputPort instance.

newOutputPort

public static OutputPort newOutputPort(Run run,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       int depth,
                                       AbstractPortValue value)
Create a new OutputPort. Note: For internal use only.

Parameters:
run - the run that the port belongs to.
name - the port name.
depth - the depth of the data in the port.
value - the port value data structure.
Returns:
a new OutputPort instance.

newPortData

public static PortDataValue newPortData(Run run,
                                        java.net.URI reference,
                                        java.lang.String type,
                                        long size)
Create a new instance of PortData. Note: For internal use only.

Parameters:
run - the run that the data belongs to.
reference - the URI reference to the data on the remote server.
type - the mime type of the data.
size - the size of the data in bytes.
Returns:
a new PortData instance.

newPortList

public static PortListValue newPortList(Run run,
                                        java.net.URI reference,
                                        java.util.List<AbstractPortValue> list)
Create a new instance of PortList. Note: For internal use only.

Parameters:
run - the run that the list belongs to.
reference - the URI reference to the list on the remote server.
list - the list of values that makes up this list.
Returns:
a new PortList instance.

newPortError

public static PortErrorValue newPortError(Run run,
                                          java.net.URI reference,
                                          long size)
Create a new instance of PortError. Note: For internal use only.

Parameters:
run - the run that the error belongs to.
reference - the URI reference to the error on the remote server.
size - the size of the error data in bytes.
Returns:
a new PortError instance.
